Thanks for being with us throughout the tweet review of #KisKiskoPyaarKaroon.
While #KisKiskoPyaarKaroon might come across as an extension of @KapilSharmaK9's show, it guarantees good laugh. Stay away if not #CNWK fan
@KapilSharmaK9 once again proves that he needn't make an effort to make people laugh. #KisKiskoPyaarKaroon
.@arbaazSkhan love the innocence with which you pull off those super-hilarious gags. #KisKiskoPyaarKaroon
This is as funny n confusing as the film - how is #KapilSharma hilarious even while doing a highly emotional scene? #KisKiskoPyaarKaroon
#SupriyaPathak is such a fine actress. She understands both genres - comedy and drama - really well. #KisKiskoPyaarKaroon
.@arbaazSkhan is genuinely funny in #KisKiskoPyaarKaroon. The wedding sequence will hardly leave you with any time to stop laughing.
As expected #KisKiskoPyaarKaroon works coz of @KapilSharmaK9. His gags, dialogues might not b completely new, but some are endlessly funny.
What's refreshing about #KisKiskoPyaarKaroon is that it doesn't use vulgarity in the name of comedy to make people laugh. @KapilSharmaK9
Less of #Elliavram acting and more of her sexy moves is what #KisKiskoPyaarKaroon offers.
.@KapilSharmaK9 scores full points for carrying off the birthday scene with aplomb. #KisKiskoPyaarKaroon
It is interesting to see how @varunsharma90 is taking  all the right steps to make comedy his forte. #Kiskiskopyaarkaroon
Samundar song is unintentionally funny. shot in such a weird way. #KapilSharma as an emotional man is hard to accept. #KisKiskoPyaarKaroon
But before u think it is hilarious, let us tell you it was supposed to be an emotional scene that went horribly wrong #KisKiskoPyaarKaroon
Never saw anybody get tense on #karwachauth. festival brings confusion for @KapilSharmaK9 but he finds his comfort #KisKiskoPyaarKaroon
What you get is what you see and what you see manages to leave you in splits (partially). That's how #KisKiskoPyaarKaroon first half is.
.@varunsharma90 your 'science ka gyaan' without any logic, relevance makes comedic sense. #KisKiskoPyaarKaroon
Battle over @KapilSharmaK9's brief, manner he is being chased by his 3 wives in a mall look easy. Been done well #KisKiskoPyaarKaroon
.@arbaazSkhan you are too good! Confused humour in your scenes with @KapilSharmaK9 have come out really well. #KisKiskoPyaarKaroon
We are a bit confused! Is #ElliAvram really speaking her dialogues? Can't believe she can speak in pure Hindi. #KisKiskoPyaarKaroon
Kapil might not have been able to rope in #DeepikaPadukone, but fills in the void by calling Elli by that name #KisKiskoPyaarKaroon
.@KapilSharmaK9 makes his debut on the big screen. Catch the live tweet review of #KisKiskoPyaarKaroon here:
There hasn't been any reallllly funny scene till now, but we are still smiling. #KapilSharma impact! #KisKiskoPyaarKaroon
Swanky cars, suave and confident look. Well @KapilSharmaK9 doesn't look like our regular #CNWK host. #KisKiskoPyaarKaroon

The tweet review of #KattiBatti  is over. Stay tuned for more movies update.
#KattiBatti : Don't expect any suspense, thrill or out of the box twist.
#KattiBatti is a contemporary lovestory with a new treatment. Go for it to experience a basic romantic tale you'll exit with tears.
#KattiBatti : It would have been better if makers would've promoted it as a regular romantic comedy. Nothing 'thriller' like.
#KattiBatti : It will be better if you don't get to know Payal's side of story. It's disappointing!
#KattiBatti : Madhav's optimism is commendable, somewhat reminds you of one sided love of Kundan in #Ranjhaanaa
#KattiBatti : More than #Kangana it's an ImranKhan movie as it's his quest and journey back to life after a painful heart break.
#KattiBatti : "Pyaar ka dard pyaar se zyada bikta hai. DDLJ kitni baar bani? Aur Devdas?" Point noted!
#KattiBatti : The entire film till now is from the point of view of Madhav. It would be nice to know Payal's side now!
#KattiBatti : The suspense that the makers were so keen on, is still to set in the film.
#KattiBatti : The first half is all about heartbroken #ImranKhan and heartbreaker #KanganaRanaut.
#KattiBatti : Behind every joke and laughter, there is a certain intensity in every character.
#KattiBatti : @ShankarEhsanLoy music is peppy, catchy and has it's patent touch to it. Something you listen on a loop all day.
#KattiBatti : The college sequences are funny and the chemistry between #KanganaRanaut and #ImranKhan is crackling!
#KattiBatti : The 'cut to' sequences between the past and present has been treated well. Kudos to the director for carrying it out well.

.@IMDb @toreehcakes #IMDbAskBrie
Thanks @brielarson for chatting w/ us & to everyone for your Q's. Check out the full @RoomTheMovie chat on #IMDb.
A: @brielarson's #IMDb1stCredit
@IMDb "My first job to actually make money, I deejayed for a couple of years on weekends!" - BL #IMDbAskBrie
Any trivia we don't have on your @IMDb profile? #IMDbAskBrie
.@IMDb @JaviiMontalvo "Trying to keep yourself strong and alert, not drained I couldn't go in the sun for 3-4 months." - BL
.@IMDb @JaviiMontalvo "Making sure I had the emotional stamina to get through it, we shot for 59 day— long time for a movie of this nature."
What was the most challenging part about taking on this role? @JaviiMontalvo @brielarson @IMDb #IMDbAskBrie
.@IMDb @toreehcakes "I spoke w/ a trauma specialist, nutritionist, stayed @ home for a month to see what it was like to be tuned out." - BL
How did you prepare yourself mentally and emotionally for this role? @toreehcakes @IMDb @brielarson #IMDbAskBrie
.@IMDb  "Usually my warm up karaoke song will be 'Burn' by Usher. It's my go-to." - BL #IMDbAskBrie
As a professional singer, what's your "go-to" karaoke song? #IMDbAskBrie
.@IMDb "Wild! It was my 1st real tour. I opened for his "Beautiful Soul" tour, it was pandemonium, I felt like a Beatle—It was CRAZY." - BL
You went on tour with Jesse McCartney in 2005: What was that experience like? #IMDbAskBrie
"I want to be Han Solo..." #IMDbAskBrie
If there was going to be a remake of any movie, which one would you like to be in and as what part? @dyemery @brielarson @IMDb #IMDbAskBrie
"How did you know you had to play Ma?" #IMDbAskBrie #Room @brielarson
.@IMDb @toreehcakes "Well, I didn't know. You don't go in set & sure. You go in w/ questions & look forward to discovering the answer" - BL
Loved u in Short Term 12 & i love u playing strong lead roles! How did u know u had to play Ma? @toreehcakes @IMDb @brielarson #IMDbAskBrie
A: @brielarson shares her #IMDb1stCredit
Tell us about your IMDb 1st credit? #IMDbAskBrie
.@brielarson taking time to stop and smell the flowers here at #IMDb
"It was an absolute honor #IMDb is the only website I check obsessively since I was 10. I think IMDb is 100% responsible for my career."- BL
Congratulations on your TIFF Breakout Starmeter Award, @brielarson ! How was it for you winning for your performance in ROOM? #IMDbAskBrie

Thanks @twhiddleston @RealGDT #MiaWasikowska for chatting w/ us & to everyone for your Q's. Check out @CrimsonPeak in theaters October 16!
“Brush your teeth before the kissing scene.” - TH #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
Final Q! Is there advice, given to you by Guillermo, that you find useful in and out Crimson Peak's set? @garifoulline #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
"It was really nice. In OLLA my character finds Mia’s character…inconsiderate. A trashy, unsophisticated vampire who is in the way." - TH
"It’s always great when you work with somebody that you know and you have a shared experience together." - MW #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
TH +MW: What's it like to go from OLLA where ur characters hate each other to CP where there's romance? @DamaskRebellion #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
"I agree!" - MW #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
"I think there’s something about enjoying being frightened in a safe place." - TH #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
Why do you think people enjoy watching horror movies so much? @PuiKuanCheah #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
"Be yourself above all else and trust yourself. Be kind, be brave, be on time!" - TH #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
"Trust your instincts." - MW #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
Tom and Mia - Advice to young actors? @_Noemimn #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
"Pants. With elastic waists." - MW #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
"The refrigerator, deodorant and penicillin." - TH #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
To all: What piece of modern technology would you introduce to the Victorian era? @noodlenida #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
"Guillermo finds beauty in the shadows." - TH #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
"The central characters are never sacrificed for scares or the horror." - MW #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
What do you think sets apart Guillermo's movies from other horror movies? @PuiKuanCheah #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
"What’s up? Why are you here? I’d just want to know why it was haunting me…" - MW #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
To lovely #MiaWasikowska! What would you say to any ghost if you ever got a chance to encounter one? @lightneverfades #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
"The commitment everybody in every department and every cast member put into the film." - GDT #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
"Working with the people you’d always want to." - MW #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
"Working with Guillermo and Mia!" - TH #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
#IMDbAskCrimsonPeak Good morning! What was your favorite part of making this movie? The costumes? The script? @__olivegreen
"PJ Harvey : Red Right hand" - GDT #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
"The Sun Ain’t Gonna Shine Anymore by The Walker Brothers." - TH #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
If #CrimsonPeak could be described by one song, what song would it be? @_ShezzaHolmes_ #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
"I see it as my duty to surprise myself and surprise the audience. I never want to do the same thing twice." - TH #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
Tom do u ever get concerned other roles u play (Avengers) steer people's minds on the roles you do play? @johnover #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
"Yes. Very much so. Especially Mrs Damvers for the character of Jessica and how she and the house are one." - GDT #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
Bonus Qs! Did du Maurier's Rebecca and Hitchcock's adaptation influence you at all? @tayariel #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
"I have very pleasant memories of my work with him in a very unpleasant production experience." - GDT #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
"They actually hired Dan because he worked with me on Mimic!" - GDT #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
Last Q! GDT: Did you hire Dan Laustsen because of silent hill? Is that film an influence on yours? @MadmanMoe06 #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
"Yes absolutely! I love the genre, but I only ever really knew the classic stories until I got a whole new education from Guillermo." - MW
"I’ve read more Gothic romance than I’ve seen, but I loved Hitchcock’s Rebecca." - TH #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
Tom and Mia, were you fans of Gothic romance movies before crimson peak and if so do you have a favourite? @lauraJW09 #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
"Long hot shower and a hamburger." - TH #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
"I’d watch Grand Designs and Downton Abbey. And enjoy the serenades!" - MW #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
"I often serenaded the crew with impromptu songs. On the weekends I even hired a mariachi band!" - GDT
Excited, although scared, to see the film. How did everyone relax after shooting intense scenes all day? @C_Joyce3183 #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
"It was incredible beautiful. I was very moved by the ending. There’s a theme about the power of love which I found very profound." -TH
"I was surprised that I still felt the anticipation. Even though I knew what was going to happen I still felt the fear & adrenaline." - MW

Behind the scenes with #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
"Guilty, ashamed and tragic." - TH #IMDbAskCrimsonPeak
